name: Arrow.23.11.2020
description:
First update of arrow! (An angry-birds inspired game made for practice and fun)

Controls:

> Simply drag the arrow and aim towards the enemies.

> Press 'R' to quickly restart the current level

> *Temporary* Press 'A' or 'D' to traverse levels (There are only 6 levels at the moment because im lazy).

Changes:
  • Physics are much more responsive and smooth
  • Fixed a few major bugs (there are probably so many more that I don't know about)
  • Added shiny spikes, which kill anything that touches them, including you! (the arrow).
  • Added a drag limit
  • Added Bouncers (bouncy guys)
  • Added Metal Crates, which are indestructible and heavier than wooden crates.
  • Added 4 new levels along with a second Sector (starting from level 6)
  • Added a cool ghost death effect.
  • Background particles now have noise and look much better
  • A few easter-eggs
  • Reworked some scuffed behaviours and code like jittery arrow and camera movement.
  • Cursor and Icons have been changed (the cursor is way bigger than its supposed to be for some goddamn reason, thanks WebGL)
Known bugs:

- You can still touch the arrow after it was launched

- idfk some more bugs ig
